pullrequest.title: Clean up internal resources when a model gets removed

content.raw:
I want to cross-post in this PR the comment [#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-gazebo/issues/39/load-model-during-runtime-how-to-run-model#comment-54274156](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-gazebo/issues/39/load-model-during-runtime-how-to-run-model#comment-54274156) since the missing support to unload model plugins may be another source of memory leaks during model removal.

‌
content.html:
I want to cross-post in this PR the comment #!/ignitionrobotics/ign-gazebo/issues/39/load-model-during-runtime-how-to-run-model#comment-54274156 since the missing support to unload model plugins may be another source of memory leaks during model removal.
